name: kosmic.io
description:
Talking to learners of different age, we realized that the reason why there isn’t a leading online education platform today is that videos all over the internet lacks engagement. Learners get distracted or lost motivation along the journey. Launching again soon in 2019 December, Kosmic is building a live-streaming platform for content producers all around the world to provide addictive educational videos, starting with high-school students in Hong Kong and London soon. 

Reach out to us at talents@kosmic.io if you'd like to be involved any way you can imagine!

team.title: Marketing Lead
team.name: Wing Tung Jessica Lam
team.bioHtml: Currently working in a online learning livestream platform. Looking for freelance jobs and collaboration.

jobs.title: Full-Stack Engineer
jobs.description:
Talking to learners of different ages, we realized that the reason why there isn’t a leading online education platform today is that videos all over the internet lack engagement. Learners get distracted or lost motivation along the journey. Launched again in 2020 January, Kosmic is building a live-streaming platform for content producers all around the world to provide addictive educational videos, starting with high-school students in Hong Kong and London soon.

Kosmic is an engineering company working on next-generation solutions for education so everyone can enjoy access to engaging educational content. Our engineers build and maintain next-generation technologies that will change how millions of learners all over the world learn and master the knowledge from a compelling knowledge hub we built from ground up. At Kosmic, you will work with our Product Team closely, talk to customers, fix pain points on the fly so our product can to handle, and most importantly organize knowledge under rapid growth. We are looking for Full-Stack Engineers with strong front-end web development ability in React to join our engineering team and build products across the full-stack.


Responsibilities:
1. Feature development and engineering excellence
2. Develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve software.
3. Manage individual project priorities, deadlines and deliverables.
4. Identify and resolve customer pain points, performance and scalability issues with Product Team, partners and users.


Preferred Qualifications
1. Strong front-end web development ability in React/JavaScript/HTML/CSS
2. 1+ Year industry experience
3. Passion for code quality and enabling others to more quickly develop reliable, performant code
4. Fluency in Django and related web technologies
5. Experience with modern JavaScript libraries and tooling such as React.
6. Ability to participate and advise on all aspects of product development (design, architecture, implementation and testing)
7. Product, design and UX sensibilities.

Our Tech Stack:
1. React.js
2. Django

*Kosmic is committed to working with the best and brightest people from the broadest talent pool possible. We believe a diversity of ideas fosters innovation and engagement, and allows us to attract the best people, and to develop the best products, services and solutions. Qualified individuals from all walks of life are encouraged to apply.

jobs.title: Growth Marketing Lead, Hong Kong
jobs.description:
Talking to learners of different ages, we realized that the reason why there isn’t a leading online education platform today is that videos all over the internet lack engagement. Learners get distracted or lost motivation along the journey. Launched again in 2020 January, Kosmic is building a live-streaming platform for content producers all around the world to provide addictive educational videos, starting with high-school students in Hong Kong and soon London.

We are looking for someone street-smart, data-driven, experienced in execution and can break out norms to run growth marketing, using all tricks in your playbook to drive growth in multiple aspects. The mandate is simple: leverage creative minds of you and your team to drive user growth, streamer growth very effectively with all channels you can imagine, or build.

Must Haves:
- Live in Hong Kong (sorry, no exceptions)
- Believe in our vision to facilitate the distribution of addictive educational content.
- Speak Cantonese (so you can better engage our local audience, or you gotta convince us you can do so)
- An expectation that you are going to roll up your sleeves and build something absolutely amazing in the intersection of education and live-streaming.
- Ability to break out the norm
- Deep expertise in guerrilla marketing

Ideal:
- Experience in growth hacking
- An experienced user of a live-streaming feature on Instagram, TikTok, Twitch or a similar platform - for work or for fun.
- Deep passion for marketing.

*Kosmic is committed to working with the best and brightest people from the broadest talent pool possible. We believe a diversity of ideas fosters innovation and engagement, and allows us to attract the best people, and to develop the best products, services and solutions. Qualified individuals from all walks of life are encouraged to apply.

jobs.title: Intern, Hong Kong
jobs.description:
DARE TO EXPERIMENT

- We jump way out of our comfort zone to experiment - to do the things we think we cannot do.
- We work on every and any idea aiming to delight our users. Don’t be afraid to fail. Learn from mistakes.
- We believe in A+ work, and nothing short of that. 
- We are building an infrastructure that facilitates content producers producing world-class educational content of all kinds, and hence delighting users.

We are looking for interns from different areas to fill up multiple positions in our Hong Kong office. We are interested in the person more than the role so do not let the job descriptions hold you back, some of the best opportunities are not listed. We raised capital from investors so we can pay competitively and provide equity/stock options to talents.

During the internship, you get exposure to different areas in marketing like social media, advertising, public relations and our expansion into curriculums like A-Levels, SAT and IB.

Here's who are we looking for :
- Sense of humour, quick on your feet
- Fluent in pop culture and digital language
- A thirst for knowledge
- A strong interest in technologies, entertainment, and education.
- Able to work both as part of a team and independently
- Able to multitask, prioritise, and manage time efficiently
- Took IBDP/A-Levels/SAT
- Native English speaker (Cantonese is a plus)
- Experience with digital marketing is a plus

We are always looking for amazing talent to join us here at Kosmic. If you are interested in working with us but do not see an open role that fits your expertise and interests, please send us your details here or at talents@kosmic.io. We will be in touch as soon as possible.

We appreciate your interest.

We are always looking for amazing talent to join us here at Kosmic. If you are interested in working with us but do not see an open role that fits your expertise and interests, please send us your details here or at talents@kosmic.io. We will be in touch as soon as possible.

We appreciate your interest.

jobs.title: Senior Frontend Software Engineer, Web
jobs.description:
Talking to learners of different ages, we realized that the reason why there isn’t a leading online education platform today is that videos all over the internet lack engagement. Learners get distracted or lost motivation along the journey. Launched in 2020 January, Kosmic is building a live-streaming platform for content producers all around the world to provide addictive educational videos, starting with high-school students in Hong Kong and London soon.

Kosmic is an engineering company working on next-generation solutions for education so everyone can enjoy access to engaging educational content. Our engineers build and maintain next-generation technologies that will change how millions of learners all over the world learn and master the knowledge from a compelling knowledge hub we built from ground up. At Kosmic, you will work with our Product Team closely, talk to customers, fix pain points on the fly so our product can to handle, and most importantly organize knowledge under rapid growth. We are looking for a Senior Front-end Software Engineer to build features on our streaming platform with a heavy focus on user side.
 
Responsibilities:
1. Implement the features and user interfaces on Kosmic - our video-focused platform.
2. Architect efficient and reusable front-end systems that drive complex web applications.
3. Collaborate with Product Designers, Product Managers, and Software Engineers to deliver compelling user-facing products.
4. Identify and resolve customer pain points, performance and scalability issues with Product Team, partners and users.

Preferred Qualifications:
1. 3+ Year industry experience
2. Passion for code quality and enabling others to more quickly develop reliable, performant code
3. Fluency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and related web technologies
4. Experience with modern JavaScript libraries and tooling such as React.
5. Ability to participate and advise on all aspects of product development (design, architecture, implementation and testing)
6. Product, design and UX sensibilities.

Our Tech Stack:
1. React.js
2. Django 2.x

*Kosmic is committed to working with the best and brightest people from the broadest talent pool possible. We believe a diversity of ideas fosters innovation and engagement, and allows us to attract the best people, and to develop the best products, services and solutions. Qualified individuals from all walks of life are encouraged to apply.

We are interested in the person more than the role so do not let the job descriptions hold you back, some of the best opportunities are not listed. We raised capital from investors so we can pay competitively and provide equity/stock options to talents.

We appreciate your interest.
